channel.title: Billy Bucket
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Billy Bucket" - How rare?

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded:
Hi. I'm at level 20 Tai and level 19 on Gen and i was hoping that there are any buckets where I can store some important items that i'm gonna lose. I hope you can help me and I appreciate all that you do for this wonderful site. Is there a way to get the buckets myself???????…….I'm playing the game for the first time in the last 3 or 4 months i think, so i really still dont have everything that's known, there are many things that i dont know……

thank you very much
b1uttercup

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: He doesn't help get Buckets. He's just who kreatur was running missions with. (Presumably for drops to sell.)

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: dont you mean billy/olmek/The HoClause? not emosuke? dont see how he would help get buckets =P

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: Legacy, 1100 stamina, billy/olmek/emosuke = at least 15 buckets/day

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded:
Finally, 26 bily bucket + 105 note pages.

ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh

how long it takes ? 10 - 30 may. = 20 days for collect the billy bucket as red eye. :(

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded:
after full 2 weeks, my billy bucket only 14.
huammmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm……
redeye self problem.
:(

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: sorry. i am redeye.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded:
450 stamina x 3 days A reguler mission with billy lv.3 + hoclaus + olmek + stand by your ninja = 8 smoke boms + 2 billy bucket.

:(

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded:
same…
i use to farm 20 emo cd 8-12 razor blades 1-3 billy buckets 5 smokebombs on a daily basis while running A-Missions

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: Im legacy had no problem getting all 3 razorblades in one day. never attempted for bucket thou.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded:
I'm beginning to think that it may be bloodline dependent. My first character (Legacy) started using Billy Lvl 3, Emosuke Lvl 2, and The HoClaus and tried farming Billy Buckets and Razor Blades. He got a Billy Bucket almost immediately (I then switched Billy out for Lil' Bo Lvl 2 because I also wanted a Hollow Leg. I'm greedy), but it took three days before I got my first Razor Blade.

My second character (WhiteEye), using the same team, has had almost the opposite experience, getting two Razor Blades before getting his first Billy Bucket.

My Third Character (Redeye) has three Razor Blades and no Billy Buckets, but he doesn't count since he doesn't have Billy Lvl 3.

Something to ponder.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: Judging by it's ability (+10 range, +10 str) and the fact that it doesn't use any Chakra, you can be certain it does use up the bucket. Mind you, this is only important if you're a redeye, if you're not, you can't use it anyways.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: I had 5 buckets and only kept one for Emosuke lv 3. now i heard about this jutsu that requires the Bucket. Does it "consume" the Bucket or is it like the Piercing Jutsu thaat needs a Nin dog but doesn't consume it?

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded:
I wasn't blaming you guys. ^_^

I was just sad. I've updated the page to reflect it.

(Plus it turns out I'll have internet, so no loss for me. =D )

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: We're kind of at the whim of what people submit. No one who contributes here has any special access to the game to know stuff more than anyone else.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: I really wish the wiki had said something about the 48 hour waiting period for Emosuke Lvl3. Now I'm going to need to collect more razor blades because I'm not going to have internet access this weekend.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: Two Billy Buckets back to back today. But I haven't gotten any razors yet!

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: Actually, Billy Lvl. 3 + Olmek + The HoClaus would probably make getting Billy Buckets really easy. You'd pick them up twice as often, and when you did you'd get two of them.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: If you're Season 2, Olmek makes Billy Buckets easier to acquire, especially since you need them for some of Emosuke Lvl. 3's jutsu.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: It's 2 weeks until the stamina penalty. I've heard your starting stamina for the day gets reduced by 50% if you're a jonin, by 67% if you're a Sannin. So if your max stamina is 200, you'll start at 100 as a Jonin (but all bonuses are still normal strength).

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: Errr. rather, my question was how harsh is the Stamina penalty.

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the quick response… another question. How long do you have after your first stat hits 18 to loop?

item.title: Re: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: I've heard it's pretty rare, with the wait being in the order of days (but not weeks).

item.title: Billy Bucket
item.content:encoded: How long should I expect to have to wait to get one?
